channel.title: Computers and the Internet on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Computers and the Internet on PepsFeeder

item.title: No, a Remote Amazon Tribe Did Not Get Addicted to Porn
item.description: ography A viral story about a remote Amazon tribe getting addicted to pornography after encountering a smartphone is not true. The story was first published in 2018 and has been debunked by multiple fact-checking organizations.

item.title: A Small Army Combating a Flood of Deepfakes in India’s Election
item.description: The Indian government has deployed a small army of fact-checkers to combat a flood of deepfakes during the country’s general election, which began on Thursday.
